name: Landeed
long_description:
Landeed is the digital infrastructure for property intelligence, verification, and transactions in India. We provide read/write rails that turn fragmented property and regulatory records into verified data for managing compliance and completing transactions. Landeed uses AI-powered document intelligence and proprietary language models to convert messy records into queryable data that powers title search, legal-grade due diligence, collateral verification, title transfers and property payments. With coverage across 24 states, enterprises go live nationally from day one. We are trusted by Fortune India 500 companies across BFSI, real estate, and retail.

Landeed is the blue tick for property.
one_liner: Landeed is India’s digital infrastructure for property intelligence,…
